script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Our next contestant is a man of many talents. Please welcome Andrea, a Google Data Engineer from London, originally from Italy! When he's not crunching numbers, he's strumming chords. Tonight, he's putting a unique spin on a classic from Michael Jackson, acoustically. Andrea's dedicating this performance to someone special in the room tonight... let's see if his feelings translate through the music!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Wow, bold move covering the King of Pop with just an acoustic guitar! Gotta respect the guts on that one.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Totally! Stripping it back like that takes confidence.  Plus, you can't go wrong with a MJ classic, am I right?

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: There's a real sweetness to his voice. You can feel the emotion behind the lyrics.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Blushing over here! That was incredibly kind of you, Andrea.  It was a really heartfelt performance.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: So, judges, did Andrea's performance compute?  Was it a byte out of your heart?  Let's hear your decisions!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: I'm gonna say yes. It was a cool twist on a classic, and hey, any guy who puts himself out there like that deserves a shot!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Yeah, I'm a yes too.  Always down for a good love song, especially when it's done with this much heart.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: It was genuine and heartfelt.  Yes from me.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you've got a yes from me.  Who knows, maybe we can grab that coffee after the show!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses! Looks like love is in the air tonight! Congratulations Andrea, you're moving on!  And to our viewers at home, don't change that channel, because Google's Got Talent is just getting started!
